collaborate.title:
Together we can revalorate and resignify your city.
Using Arte and New Technologies.

explore.header: Come and live a story through urban art and new technologies!
explore.subheader: Download "BookSonWall APP" to enjoy the stories and experience urban art and augmented reality.

home.enjoy_the_experience: Enjoy a hypermedia experience and live a story through urban art!
home.take_a_tour: Take a tour through the city with the BooksOnWall App.
home.title: Art and urban culture
home.we_are: We are a creative collective that tells stories around the world.
home.we_connet: We connect people with their territories and revalue their own narratives through art and digital technologies.
